issue_title: Add a project file tree diagram to README.md
issue_body:
Use the `list_files` tool to explore the repository structure, then add a `## Project Structure` section to `README.md` showing a file tree diagram.

Example format:
```
crowd-agent/
├── agent/
│   ├── main.py
│   ├── tools.py
│   └── ...
├── dashboard/
│   └── ...
├── README.md
└── ...
```

Include all top-level files and directories, and expand the contents of the `agent/` and `.github/` directories. Keep other directories collapsed with `...`.

Add this section after the first heading/intro paragraph of the README.

plan_steps.description: Implement: Add a project file tree diagram to README.md
